title: Sheltered
description: Shay Logan is determined, caring, and knows no limit. Her life revolves around her work, and the animals that she loves dearly. Her parents own a family run shelter for injured and neglected animals. She would do anything to protect her precious shelter, no matter the cost. Working at the shelter makes her happy… until it doesn’t.Trace McCarty is driven. He is a stern no bullshit taker. He co-owns a construction business with his four best friends – his life revolves around deadlines and they thrill him to no end. Their latest job was meant to be a summer of scouting land and levelling it out for the new base for their expanding business. It was easy… until it wasn’t.Shay is used to dealing with animals. Trace is used to dealing with wood. Neither of them know how to deal with one another.When Trace’s neighbouring construction site causes problems for Shay’s beloved shelter, war is declared. Trace doesn't see the blonde pixie as a threat, but when she infiltrates his business and throws a monkey wrench into his carefully laid out plans, all bets are off.Shay and Trace go head to head and engage in a battle of both words... and flying timber. May the best person, and business, win.
author: L.A. Casey
